text: An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the fan noise on the MSI GL62M 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop English Version. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the MSI GL62M 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop English Version is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the fan noise on the MSI GL62M 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop English Version. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Valorant. The build quality of the MSI GL62M 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop English Version is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Elden Ring. The build quality of the MSI GL62M 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop English Version is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
